title: How To Build a Kubernetes Operator From Scratch
author: Joshua Masiko
description: Operators streamline workflows, reduce manual intervention and support infrastructure management, key skills for anyone working in DevOps.
cntitle: 如何从零开始构建 Kubernetes Operator
cndescription: Operator 可以简化工作流程、减少人工干预并支持基础设施管理，这些都是 DevOps 工作人员的关键技能。
